overview: The show addresses everyday life, a well-elaborated text about current affairs (politics, sports, technology, celebrities) places he went through, his new life as a father, having to "become a man", leave his parents' house, grow up, but never stop kidding. The eternal child still disturbs his world and promises “Burn the Movie” of everything and everyone that is approached in this play, but mainly, of himself.
title: Fábio Rabin: Queimando o Filme
